ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:70}); // {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} Blow the whistle and
{CHOICE} call the dolphin.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Tifa}
“Don't you just hate this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“What happened to this town?
It's so run-down…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“What kinda place is this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“Did you see a man with a black cape?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“Are you all right now?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // {Aeris}
“I heard that girl regained consciousness.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // {Aeris}
“You think Rufus is thinking about
crossing the ocean from here, too?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // “What?
Does that mean Sephiroth
already crossed the ocean?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // {Aeris}
“Yeah, better leave it
to {Cloud}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
“Yeah, I'd like to take a good look
at the new President of Shinra, Inc.!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Barret}
“Seems like something's goin' on up there!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Barret}
“What's that music?
It sure sounds lively.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Barret}
“Rufus!?
I gotta pay my respects.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“We gotta get to the town up there…
Mebbe we could climb the tower?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Tifa}
“Doesn't it seem a little strange?
Everything getting so noisy
all of a sudden?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Tifa}
“High voltage tower…”{PAUSE}“I guess this means
{Cloud}'ll have to do it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Tifa}
“Maybe…he dropped some from
the North Caves into the Lifestream…

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // “Sir, do you know
where the Lifestream runs through?”{PAUSE}“{Cloud} might have
drifted from there.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Red XIII}
“That looks like a Shinra soldier.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // {Red XIII}
“Does this have something to do
with the Shinra?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud},
didn't you finish Rufus off?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // {Red XIII}
“We're counting on you, {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // {Yuffie}
“Aren't you going to follow her?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Yuffie}
“What's this loud music?
It's giving me a headache!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Priscilla
“I'm sorry, I mistook you for
one of those Shinra, Inc….”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // Priscilla
“I heard they're rehearsing the reception
for the new Shinra president.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // Priscilla
“Grandpa and Grandma told me
this beach was beautiful
when they were small.”{PAUSE}“But after the Shinra built that city above,
the sun stopped shining here,
and the water got polluted…”{PAUSE}“I was raised on that story and
hate Shinra so much, I could die!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Priscilla
“No! No! There's a high voltage current
running underneath the tower.
Don't wander near it, it's dangerous!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // Priscilla
“But…you might be able to
if Mr. Dolphin helps you.
Follow me!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // Priscilla
“I'll give you something SPECIAL!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // “It's an amulet.
Take good care of it, OK?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // “It's at my house, so come by
later to pick it up, OK?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // “What?
It's not time for our shift, yet.
Just relax.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // “That's not enough!
Can't let you get on…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:39}); // “Hurry up and get in!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // “HEY!
This is Shinra, Inc.'s elevator.
Don't be snooping around here!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // “HEY!
This is Shinra, Inc.'s elevator.
Don't be snooping around here!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // “What?
It's not time for our shift, yet.
Just relax.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // “Listen {Cloud},
I'm over the hill, but
Priscilla is still a child.”{PAUSE}“Isn't there a way to protect
at least her from Meteor?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // “I just saw some Shinra soldiers
all huddled together discussing something.”{PAUSE}“They said a plane carrying Huge Materia
would be taking off from the airport above.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // “I remember years ago,
seein' the Shinra build
a long pipe underwater.”{PAUSE}“The underwater reactor is
connected to Junon by a pipe.”{PAUSE}“You should be able to get
to the reactor through it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // “I think I've heard Priscilla
mentioning 'Life…something' before.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:52}); // “What? The Northern…what?
Sorry, but I don't think I follow.”{PAUSE}“But…I think I remember hearing Priscilla
saying 'Life…something' before.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // “I think I've heard Priscilla
mentioning 'Life…something' before.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // “Sorry, {Cloud}.
Priscilla needs to rest for a while.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // “Who are you people?
Where did you come from?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // “Hmm…
I've never seen that feller before.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:47}); // “There's nothing here now…
But it used to be a busy port.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // “Once Meteor hits, not just the fish,
but the whole ocean will be destroyed…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:56}); // “It seems like
there's something going on again up there.”{PAUSE}“Is that huge plane going to
take off again with that deafening roar?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:58}); // “Once Meteor hits, not just the fish,
but the whole ocean will be destroyed…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // “There's a dolphin in the bay.
If you get close enough and
blow the whistle,
it might come to you.”{PAUSE}“If you want to get on the ship,
why not have the dolphin take you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // “I don't think I'll ever…cough…
…live to see things…
…beautiful again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // “Ever since…Shinra built that
city up above during the war…ugh, ugh.”{PAUSE}“There's been no fish in the water!
It got so polluted…phew…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:68}); // “Could be the end of the world…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:67}); // “I heard a war's about to start!
And that's why they're moving
the big cannon!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:65}); // “They say Shinra's gathering Huge Materia
from around the world and
bringing it to Junon.”{PAUSE}“Bringing it to Junon must mean
they want to use their airplanes.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:66}); // “I've noticed
there's been a lot of Shinra ships recently.
I think they're going to
the {CYAN}Junon Underwater Reactor{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“Isn't Shinra trying to
transport the Reactor's Huge Materia?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:65}); // “They say Shinra's gathering Huge Materia
from around the world and
bringing it to Junon.”{PAUSE}“Bringing it to Junon must mean
they want to use their airplanes.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:64}); // “I almost passed out
when I saw Weapon.”{PAUSE}“I heard Weapon was beaten,
but a Shinra soldier told me
there are 4 more.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:62}); // “Hey, come in for a while.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:63}); // “For the past few decades,
the only thing I've been hearing about
is the Shinra.”{PAUSE}“I miss the times
when we used to talk only about fish…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // “I know you guys want to go to
the Western Continent,
but the only way is on a Shinra ship.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:60}); // “Wow, now this is rare.
We almost never have anyone other
than the Shinra people visit this town.”

dialogStrings: Under Junon

{Cloud}
“What kinda place is this?”

{Cloud}
“Did you see a man with a black cape?”

{Cloud}
“Are you all right now?”

{Cloud}
“That's all right.”

{Cloud}
“Hey!!”

{Cloud}
“Wait a second!”

{Cloud}
“What happened to this town?
It's so run-down…”

{Barret}
“What's that music?
It sure sounds lively.”

{Barret}
“Rufus!?
I gotta pay my respects.”

{Barret}
“We gotta get to the town up there…
Mebbe we could climb the tower?”

{Barret}
“Yeah, I'd like to take a good look
at the new President of Shinra, Inc.!”

{Barret}
“Seems like something's goin' on up there!”

{Tifa}
“High voltage tower…”{PAUSE}“I guess this means
{Cloud}'ll have to do it.”

{Tifa}
“Don't you just hate this?”

{Tifa}
“Doesn't it seem a little strange?
Everything getting so noisy
all of a sudden?”

{Tifa}
“Maybe…he dropped some from
the North Caves into the Lifestream…

“Sir, do you know
where the Lifestream runs through?”{PAUSE}“{Cloud} might have
drifted from there.”

{Aeris}
“You think Rufus is thinking about
crossing the ocean from here, too?”

“What?
Does that mean Sephiroth
already crossed the ocean?”

{Aeris}
“Yeah, better leave it
to {Cloud}!”

{Aeris}
“You're probably right.”

{Aeris}
“I heard that girl regained consciousness.”

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud},
didn't you finish Rufus off?”

{Red XIII}
“We're counting on you, {Cloud}.”

{Red XIII}
“That looks like a Shinra soldier.”

{Red XIII}
“Does this have something to do
with the Shinra?”

{Yuffie}
“Aren't you going to follow her?”

{Yuffie}
“What's this loud music?
It's giving me a headache!”

Priscilla
“Umm…thanks for helping…”

Priscilla
“I'm sorry, I mistook you for
one of those Shinra, Inc….”

Priscilla
“I heard they're rehearsing the reception
for the new Shinra president.”

Priscilla
“Grandpa and Grandma told me
this beach was beautiful
when they were small.”{PAUSE}“But after the Shinra built that city above,
the sun stopped shining here,
and the water got polluted…”{PAUSE}“I was raised on that story and
hate Shinra so much, I could die!”

Priscilla
“No! No! There's a high voltage current
running underneath the tower.
Don't wander near it, it's dangerous!”

Priscilla
“But…you might be able to
if Mr. Dolphin helps you.
Follow me!”

Priscilla
“I'll give you something SPECIAL!”

“It's an amulet.
Take good care of it, OK?”

“It's at my house, so come by
later to pick it up, OK?”

“If you want to
get on the elevator that badly,
give me 10 gil!”
{CHOICE}Okay, I guess
{CHOICE}No way!
“Hurry up and get in!”
“You're such a cheapskate.”

“HEY!
This is Shinra, Inc.'s elevator.
Don't be snooping around here!!”

“What?
It's not time for our shift, yet.
Just relax.”

“That's not enough!
Can't let you get on…”

{Cloud}
“Uh…yeah…”

“Who are you people?
Where did you come from?”

“Hmm…
I've never seen that feller before.”

“There's nothing here now…
But it used to be a busy port.”

“Sorry, {Cloud}.
Priscilla needs to rest for a while.”

“I just saw some Shinra soldiers
all huddled together discussing something.”{PAUSE}“They said a plane carrying Huge Materia
would be taking off from the airport above.”

“I remember years ago,
seein' the Shinra build
a long pipe underwater.”{PAUSE}“The underwater reactor is
connected to Junon by a pipe.”{PAUSE}“You should be able to get
to the reactor through it.”

“What?
{Cloud} is missing?”

“What? The Northern…what?
Sorry, but I don't think I follow.”{PAUSE}“But…I think I remember hearing Priscilla
saying 'Life…something' before.”

“I think I've heard Priscilla
mentioning 'Life…something' before.”

“Listen {Cloud},
I'm over the hill, but
Priscilla is still a child.”{PAUSE}“Isn't there a way to protect
at least her from Meteor?”

“Ever since…Shinra built that
city up above during the war…ugh, ugh.”{PAUSE}“There's been no fish in the water!
It got so polluted…phew…”

“It seems like
there's something going on again up there.”{PAUSE}“Is that huge plane going to
take off again with that deafening roar?”

“I don't think I'll ever…cough…
…live to see things…
…beautiful again.”

“Once Meteor hits, not just the fish,
but the whole ocean will be destroyed…”

“There's a dolphin in the bay.
If you get close enough and
blow the whistle,
it might come to you.”{PAUSE}“If you want to get on the ship,
why not have the dolphin take you?”

“Wow, now this is rare.
We almost never have anyone other
than the Shinra people visit this town.”

“I know you guys want to go to
the Western Continent,
but the only way is on a Shinra ship.”
“Hey, come in for a while.”

“For the past few decades,
the only thing I've been hearing about
is the Shinra.”{PAUSE}“I miss the times
when we used to talk only about fish…”

“I almost passed out
when I saw Weapon.”{PAUSE}“I heard Weapon was beaten,
but a Shinra soldier told me
there are 4 more.”

“They say Shinra's gathering Huge Materia
from around the world and
bringing it to Junon.”{PAUSE}“Bringing it to Junon must mean
they want to use their airplanes.”

“I've noticed
there's been a lot of Shinra ships recently.
I think they're going to
the {CYAN}Junon Underwater Reactor{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“Isn't Shinra trying to
transport the Reactor's Huge Materia?”

“I heard a war's about to start!
And that's why they're moving
the big cannon!”
“Could be the end of the world…”
Received "Shiva" Materia!

{PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} Blow the whistle and
{CHOICE} call the dolphin.
